== Post Deployment Steps ==

# After deployment of your solution. Below are the screen shots to validate the file locations and features.

1. Go to SharePoint Central Administration -> System Settings -> Manager Farm Solution and validate your solution status

http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Deployment1.png

2. Go to SharePoint Central Administration -> Monitoring -> Review Job Definitions and validate your timer job

http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Deployment3.png

3. Go to your site -> Site Actions -> Site Settings -> Site Collection features and validate your features

http://visual-studio-sharepoint-project-template.googlecode.com/svn/Deployment2.png

and all the file which you have added in your solution can be verified 14 hive (C:\Program Files\Common Files\Microsoft Shared\Web Server Extensions\14\TEMPLATE) folder for respective location in which you have added your file
